topic.title: Cloud Deployments
topic.shortdesc: You can deploy Couchbase Server in the cloud.

section.title: Available Cloud Environments
section.p: Couchbase Server-clusters can be installed, configured, and run in the following commercially available cloud environments:

ul.li: Amazon Web Services: A cloud solution providing products and services that can be used as building-blocks, in support of scalable applications.
Microsoft Azure: A collection of integrated cloud services, supporting the development and management of applications.
Google Cloud Platform: Cloud-available resources for compute, storage, networking, database and data warehousing, machine learning, development, and more.

section.p: The following sections explain how to deployment Couchbase Server-clusters in each of these cloud environments.
